Articles.Content:
I'm starting a modded science playthrough, that I'm going to share via Youtube. I'd love it if some of you guys gave it a watch, and gave me any advice on how to improve my video quality for my next episodes.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKbFXz98zW4

Your audio is very quiet. You may want to bring your mic closer to you or download something like Audacity and run your audio through a normalization to maximize the peaks.

Great job, though! Good luck on the next one. Also your first flight was not "failed," it just succeeded a bit less than you wanted ;-)

Edited October 12, 2019 by dire
